title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.49 - Unattended helicopters to be secured in approved manner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.49 - Unattended helicopters to be secured in approved manner

State Regulations

Helicopters shall have braking devices and/or rotor
mooring tiedowns applied to the rotor blades. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.49

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
